arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} While you have an active {c_important}Bone Storm{/c}, hitting an unaffected enemy has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn an additional storm at their location. Each of your active Sacrifice bonuses increases the chance by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} and the total additional {c_important}Bone Storms{/c} you can have by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|~|]{/c}.
